>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/admin/law-firms/{lawFirmId}/lawyers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Use GET /admin/law-firms/\{lawFirmId\}/profiles?role=LAWYER or ?credentialType=BAR_LICENSE.

  as={"h2"}
